content.text:
我檢查了可用的工具，但目前沒有看到 Chrome MCP 工具可用。系統中可用的 MCP 伺服器是 Serena（用於程式碼編輯），而不是 Chrome 瀏覽器控制工具。

要使用 Chrome MCP，你需要：

1. **確認 Chrome MCP 已安裝並配置** - 檢查你的 Claude Code 設定中是否有配置 Chrome MCP 伺服器

2. **手動開啟網址** - 目前最簡單的方式是直接在瀏覽器中開啟：
   ```
   http://localhost:8080/user/management
   ```

3. **使用 Bash 開啟** - 我可以用系統指令幫你開啟：

已經用系統預設瀏覽器開啟 `http://localhost:8080/user/management` 了。

如果你想要使用 Chrome MCP 來控制瀏覽器（例如自動化測試或截圖），需要先在 Claude Code 的設定中配置 Chrome MCP 伺服器。你需要這方面的幫助嗎？
我來幫你安裝 Chrome MCP。讓我先搜尋一下相關資訊。

input.query: Chrome MCP Model Context Protocol browser automation 2026

content.content:
Web search results for query: "Chrome MCP Model Context Protocol browser automation 2026"

Links: [{"title":"GitHub - hangwin/mcp-chrome: Chrome MCP Server is a Chrome extension-based Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes your Chrome browser functionality to AI assistants like Claude, enabling complex browser automation, content analysis, and semantic search.","url":"https://github.com/hangwin/mcp-chrome"},{"title":"Chrome DevTools (MCP) for your AI agent | Blog | Chrome for Developers","url":"https://developer.chrome.com/blog/chrome-devtools-mcp"},{"title":"GitHub - ChromeDevTools/chrome-devtools-mcp: Chrome DevTools for coding agents","url":"https://github.com/ChromeDevTools/chrome-devtools-mcp"},{"title":"Browser MCP - Automate your browser using VS Code, Cursor, Claude, and more - Chrome Web Store","url":"https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/browser-mcp-automate-your/bjfgambnhccakkhmkepdoekmckoijdlc"},{"title":"MCP Web | Model Context Protocol for the Browser","url":"https://mcp-b.ai/"},{"title":"GitHub - BrowserMCP/mcp: Browser MCP is a Model Context Provider (MCP) server that allows AI applications to control your browser","url":"https://github.com/BrowserMCP/mcp"},{"title":"Chrome DevTools MCP: AI-Powered Browser Automation and Debugging | DataCamp","url":"https://www.datacamp.com/tutorial/chrome-devtools-mcp"},{"title":"Using Chrome DevTools MCP with Cursor for Advanced SEO & GEO Research - Go Fish Digital","url":"https://gofishdigital.com/blog/using-chrome-devtools-mcp-with-cursor-for-advanced-seo-geo-research/"},{"title":"GitHub - browserbase/mcp-server-browserbase: Allow LLMs to control a browser with Browserbase and Stagehand","url":"https://github.com/browserbase/mcp-server-browserbase"},{"title":"Browser Interaction Toolkit Mcp – Browser Automation MCP Server by Dbillionaer Model Context Protocol Tool | Free DevTools by Hexmos","url":"https://hexmos.com/freedevtools/mcp/browser-automation/Dbillionaer--browser-tools-mcp/"}]

Here are the search results for "Chrome MCP Model Context Protocol browser automation 2026":

## Chrome MCP (Model Context Protocol) Browser Automation Solutions

### Official Chrome DevTools MCP

Google has launched a public preview for the Chrome DevTools Model Context Protocol (MCP) server, bringing the power of Chrome DevTools to AI coding assistants.(no content)Coding agents face a fundamental problem: they are not able to see what the code they generate actually does when it runs in the browser. They're effectively programming with a blindfold on. The Chrome DevTools MCP server changes this. AI coding assistants are able to debug web pages directly in Chrome, and benefit from DevTools debugging capabilities and performance insights.(no content)chrome-devtools-mcp lets your coding agent (such as Gemini, Claude, Cursor or Copilot) control and inspect a live Chrome browser. It acts as a Model-Context-Protocol (MCP) server, giving your AI coding assistant access to the full power of Chrome DevTools.

**Key capabilities include:**
- Get performance insights: Uses Chrome DevTools to record traces and extract actionable performance insights. Advanced browser debugging: Analyze network requests, take screenshots and check the browser console. Reliable automation. Uses puppeteer to automate actions in Chrome and automatically wait for action results.

### Browser MCP Extension

Browser MCP is an MCP server + Chrome extension that allows you to automate your browser using AI applications like VS Code, Claude, Cursor, and Windsurf. Key benefits include:
- Fast: Automation happens locally on your machine, resulting in better performance without network latency. Private: Since automation happens locally, your browser activity stays on your device and isn't sent to remote servers. Logged In: Uses your existing browser profile, keeping you logged into all your services. Stealth: Avoids basic bot detection and CAPTCHAs by using your real browser fingerprint.

### MCP-Chrome (Extension-Based)

Chrome MCP Server is a Chrome extension-based Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes your Chrome browser functionality to AI assistants like Claude, enabling complex browser automation, content analysis, and semantic search.

Features include:
- Unlike traditional browser automation tools (like Playwright), Chrome MCP Server directly uses your daily Chrome browser, leveraging existing user habits, configurations, and login states, allowing various large models or chatbots to take control of your browser and truly become your everyday assistant.
- Support for screenshots, network monitoring, interactive operations, bookmark management, browsing history, and 20+ other tools.

### MCP-B (Browser-Based MCP)

Today's AI automation is like using a robot to read your screen and click buttons. MCP‑B lets assistants call your site's real functions instead. Add ~50 lines of code and your website becomes AI‑ready with zero configuration.(no content)Works with Chrome, Edge, and Firefox. One extension for all browsers.

### SEO & Research Applications

With Chrome DevTools MCP integrated into Cursor, you can automate comprehensive competitive analysis, extract detailed SERP features, and generate structured documentation without the manual processes that traditionally define SEO research workflows.

These MCP browser automation tools represent a significant advancement in AI-assisted web development and automation, allowing AI coding assistants to directly interact with and debug live browser sessions.


REMINDER: You MUST include the sources above in your response to the user using markdown hyperlinks.

content.text: 有幾個 Chrome MCP 選項可用。最推薦的是 **Chrome DevTools MCP**（官方 Google 支援）。讓我幫你安裝。

input.prompt: Extract the installation instructions for Claude Code, including npm install commands and configuration steps

content.content:
# Claude Code Installation Instructions

Based on the provided documentation, here are the installation steps for Chrome DevTools MCP with Claude Code:

## CLI Installation

Use the Claude Code CLI to add the Chrome DevTools MCP server:

```bash
claude mcp add chrome-devtools --scope user npx chrome-devtools-mcp@latest
```

## Manual Configuration

Alternatively, follow Claude Code's MCP configuration guide and add this to your MCP servers configuration:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "chrome-devtools": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "chrome-devtools-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}
```

## First Test

After installation, verify everything works by entering this prompt in Claude Code:

"Check the performance of https://developers.chrome.com"

The MCP server will launch the browser automatically when you use tools requiring a running browser instance. Simply connecting to the server won't start the browser on its own.

# Claude Code Installation Instructions

Based on the provided documentation, here are the installation steps for Chrome DevTools MCP with Claude Code:

## CLI Installation

Use the Claude Code CLI to add the Chrome DevTools MCP server:

```bash
claude mcp add chrome-devtools --scope user npx chrome-devtools-mcp@latest
```

## Manual Configuration

Alternatively, follow Claude Code's MCP configuration guide and add this to your MCP servers configuration:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "chrome-devtools": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "chrome-devtools-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}
```

## First Test

After installation, verify everything works by entering this prompt in Claude Code:

"Check the performance of https://developers.chrome.com"

The MCP server will launch the browser automatically when you use tools requiring a running browser instance. Simply connecting to the server won't start the browser on its own.

content.text:
Chrome DevTools MCP 已成功安裝。配置已添加到 `~/.claude.json`：

```json
"mcpServers": {
  "chrome-devtools": {
    "type": "stdio",
    "command": "npx",
    "args": ["-y", "chrome-devtools-mcp@latest"]
  }
}
```

## 下一步

**你需要重新啟動 Claude Code 才能使用新的 MCP 伺服器。**

重啟後，你可以使用 Chrome DevTools MCP 來：
- 自動開啟網頁並截圖
- 檢查網頁效能
- 分析網路請求
- 查看瀏覽器 console
- 自動化瀏覽器操作

請關閉並重新開啟 Claude Code，然後再試一次進入 `http://localhost:8080/user/management`。

---

**Sources:**
- [Chrome DevTools MCP - GitHub](https://github.com/ChromeDevTools/chrome-devtools-mcp)
- [Chrome DevTools MCP for AI Agents - Chrome Blog](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/chrome-devtools-mcp)

summary: Chrome MCP Installation and Setup Guide
